reviewText: Neil Sedaka In Concert is a fantastic one he did in Birmingham, England in 1991. At the top of his game , he does a wonderful job of performing his old and new hits. Favorite tracks are, Oh Carol, Breaking Up Is Hard To Do[both versions], Calender Girl, Solitaire, Standing On The Inside, Love Will Keep Us Together, A Little Lovin", That's When The Music Takes Me, and Laughter In The Rain. Fans of Neil Sedaka will like this the most.
Great concert for Neil Sedaka lovers.  Just him and a baby grand.
Very good old classic music in concert!

NEIL SHOULD BE INDUCTED INTO THE ROCK AND ROLL HALL OF FAME...........

HE IS THE GREATEST SINGER AND SONGWRITER........"HUNGRY YEARS"  and  "SHOULD'VE NEVER LEFT YOU GO" ARE

AMONG HIS GREATEST WORKS...........
Neil Sadaka is one of the best of the 50s singers taped in Alabama I would encourage anyone who likes music to buy it

Somewhat disappointing.

Rework of many other concerts by a great entertainer. Buy if you really like his work.

Good, and suitable for background entertainment.

This DVD is of a concert Neil Sedaka did in England, and while I might have preferred more of his old stuff be done, it is a good mix of old and newer material.  Very enjoyable to watch.  We will be seeing him live on a cruise ship in 2 months, hopefully his show there will be as good as this DVD.

After watching this you`ll feel so good. This show was only available from Europe before so an all region dvd player was needed not anymore with this realease. A truly wonderful show and well accompanied by his orchestra. He plays all is hits and we never get tired of hearing them. He sings with passion and after watching this show you`ll know what the definition performer means.
